artBlurb: During my education, one of the most influential classes I took was “Literature in the Age of AI” taught by professor Dennis Tenen. My eyes were opened to the ways that computer science, philosophy, and art could intermix and I wanted to contribute in my own way. My final project for the class explored the universal language developed by philosopher John Wilkins, and sought to recreate it using modern AI tools.
I have always been passionate about the visual arts, and have an array of work you can check out here. In the future, I hope to create pieces that combine art and computer science into something new.

artProjects.name: Instagram Art
artProjects.shortDescription: A collection of my drawings going back to high school. Mainly pen + colored pencil.

bigProjects.name: Professor Review Site
bigProjects.shortDescription: Professor and course review site for Columbia university. Users can view 1000s of real, scraped reviews and submit their own. Data visualized using ChartJS.

bigProjects.name: IMDB Chatbot
bigProjects.shortDescription: Chatbot powered by AWS services that recommends top movies from IMDB. Implemented with a Nosql database and AWS serverless design.

smallProjects.name: Recipe Finder
smallProjects.shortDescription: Frontend app that lets users search for recipes and add their own. Created with Typescript and Styled Components.

smallProjects.name: Dev Portfolio
smallProjects.shortDescription: You're looking at it. Software dev portfolio utilizing EJS and GSAP for animations. Hosted on Netlify.

smallProjects.name: To Do List
smallProjects.shortDescription: Even a mighty oak must grow from a small seed. Simple frontend project in vanilla Javascript.
